```{r load-packages}
library(baseballr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
degoat <- statcast_search_pitchers(start_date='2021-01-01', end_date=Sys.Date(), pitcherid=594798) %>%
  filter(!is.na(pitch_type))
```

```{r}
pitch_mix <- degoat %>%
  filter(!is.na(pitch_type)) %>%
  group_by(pitch_type) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n(),
    percent = count/nrow(degoat)
  ) %>%
  filter(percent > 0.01)



```
